T02D3658:264b-1: dzam bha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3658:264b-3: gnod gnas kyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3658:264b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3658:264b-5: byang chub sems dpa' gnod gnas la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D3658:264b-6: / nor 'dod pa dag gis bsgom par 'dod na /
T02D3658:264b-7: cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du byas la /
T02D3658:264b-8: gzhan du na sa bon gsum pa'i gsum pa mdog ser po /
T02D3658:264b-9: thig les mnan pa zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa /
T02D3658:264b-10: de nyid las byung ba'i mgon po gnod gnas zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3658:264b-11: g-yas na b'i dza p'u ri bsnams pa /
T02D3658:264b-12: g-yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin po che'i char 'bebs pa bsnams pa /
T02D3658:264b-13: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can /
T02D3658:264b-14: zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi mgo can dang padma'i mgo can gyi gter chen po mnan pa /
T02D3658:264b-15: rin po che la sogs pa'i char 'bebs pa /
T02D3658:264b-16: rang gi khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu bsam par bya'o //
T02D3658:264b-17: autpa la sngon po'i phreng ba kha thur du bltas
T02D3658:264b-18: pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gnod gnas su
T02D3658:264b-20: de nas phyag rgya ni lag pa thal mo khong stong du byas la /
T02D3658:264b-21: gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag pa'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang /
T02D3658:264b-24: spyi bor gtugs te bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D3658:264b-25: aom dzam bha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3658:264b-26: 'di nyid kyi chu sbyin blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
T02D3658:264b-27: mchod pa yang byas la bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D3658:264b-28: de nas nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
